attributes.action: Call For a Criminal Investigation into MP's Claims and Expel From the House with Excessive claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MP's have been clearly engaged in systematic fraud.

It is very clear that many many of the recently exposed claims by MPs were unacceptable, incompatible with remaining an MP and in many cases illegal.

Apologies (once found out) and repayment (once found out) are not accepted in normal working life and are less acceptable in their role models as MP's.

We can not have any confidence in them making sound and fair judgments in their MP affairs when their private decisions have been purely self centered

What should normal workers think if this is left unpunished.

Gordon Brown must sack his offending MP's of face the public accusation of being hypocritical.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
